price: 20.koros Yallak kalah taqbude Yallitte tu-gintam madudda is koros isi gabat ginte Yallitteh anuk, toysa usun mannal tet yaqbudeenii ?
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَخۡلُقُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yadʿūna min dūni al-lahi lā yakhluqūna shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
